Package ch.cern.dbod.ui.renderer

These classes extend ZK renderers to render the information in a different way, adding functionality inside ZK components.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description

    Renderer for job stats
    DestroyGridRenderer
    Renderer for instances to be destroyed

    Renderer for instance changes

Package ch.cern.dbod.ui.renderer Description

These classes extend ZK renderers to render the information in a different way, adding functionality inside ZK components. They make use of the entity and the util packages to perform actions on specific DB On Demand instances. An example is the class OverviewGridRenderer. This important class renders the rows inside the overview and admin table of instances according to the state of the instance, and listens for events to perform actions on the selected instance or open different controllers for more complex operations.
